TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 36 cts vs loss 36 cts Net loss 20.1 mln vs loss 12.6 mln Revs 12.5 mln vs 24.9 mln Avg shrs 55.8 mln vs 34.7 mln Year Shr loss 1.11 dlrs vs loss 1.05 dlrs Net loss 50.8 ln vs loss 31.9 mln Revs 63.7 mln vs 106.9 mln Avg shrs 45.8 mln vs 30.2 mln NOTE: Net includes extraordinary gains of 247,0000 dlrs vs nil in quarter and 809,000 dlrs vs 425,000 dlrs in year. 1985 year net includes 6,700,000 dlr credit for previous overpayments of windfall profits taxes.
